trans-unit.source: The base exception class for the <see cref="N:System.Data.SqlTypes" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 类的新实例。
